languages.text: {n}Укутанный в алое человек после такого взрыва неизбежно должен был погибнуть. Но он жив — респиратор, закрывающий половину лица, со свистом втягивает воздух.{/n}
{n}The man dressed in crimson should not have survived an explosion like that. However, he is alive — you hear the wheezing of the respirator that covers half of his face.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Укутанный в алое человек после такого взрыва неизбежно должен был погибнуть. Но он жив — респиратор, закрывающий половину лица, со свистом втягивает воздух.{/n}

{n}The man dressed in crimson should not have survived an explosion like that. However, he is alive — you hear the wheezing of the respirator that covers half of his face.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位身穿深红色长袍的人似乎根本不可能在那样的爆炸中幸存下来，然而，他却还活着。你听到了他发出的喘息声，从遮住他半张脸的呼吸器下方传来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man dressed in crimson should not have survived an explosion like that. However, he is alive — you hear the wheezing of the respirator that covers half of his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位身穿深红色长袍的人似乎根本不可能在那样的爆炸中幸存下来，然而，他却还活着。你听到了他发出的喘息声，从遮住他半张脸的呼吸器下方传来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El hombre vestido de carmesí no debería haber sobrevivido a una explosión como esa. Sin embargo, lo ha hecho, como indica el sonido sibilante del respirador que cubre la mitad de su cara.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man dressed in crimson should not have survived an explosion like that. However, he is alive — you hear the wheezing of the respirator that covers half of his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre vestido de carmesí no debería haber sobrevivido a una explosión como esa. Sin embargo, lo ha hecho, como indica el sonido sibilante del respirador que cubre la mitad de su cara.{/n}

languages.text: {n}深紅を身にまとった男があんな爆発から生き残るはずなどなかった。だが、生きている――男の顔を半分覆う呼吸器から、ゼイゼイと音が聞こえる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man dressed in crimson should not have survived an explosion like that. However, he is alive — you hear the wheezing of the respirator that covers half of his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}深紅を身にまとった男があんな爆発から生き残るはずなどなかった。だが、生きている――男の顔を半分覆う呼吸器から、ゼイゼイと音が聞こえる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'homme vêtu de rouge n'aurait jamais dû survivre à une explosion pareille, mais il est bel et bien en vie : vous entendez le sifflement du respirateur qui recouvre la moitié de son visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man dressed in crimson should not have survived an explosion like that. However, he is alive — you hear the wheezing of the respirator that covers half of his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme vêtu de rouge n'aurait jamais dû survivre à une explosion pareille, mais il est bel et bien en vie : vous entendez le sifflement du respirateur qui recouvre la moitié de son visage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der in Rot gekleidete Mann hätte eine Explosion wie diese nicht überleben dürfen. Dennoch lebt er – du hörst das Keuchen des Atemgeräts, das eine Hälfte seines Gesichts bedeckt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man dressed in crimson should not have survived an explosion like that. However, he is alive — you hear the wheezing of the respirator that covers half of his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der in Rot gekleidete Mann hätte eine Explosion wie diese nicht überleben dürfen. Dennoch lebt er – du hörst das Keuchen des Atemgeräts, das eine Hälfte seines Gesichts bedeckt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Karşında kızıla bürünmüş bir adam duruyor. Böyle bir patlamadan sağ çıkması imkânsız olsa da nedense hâlâ hayatta. Yüzünün yarısını kaplayan solunum maskesinden hırıltılar duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man dressed in crimson should not have survived an explosion like that. However, he is alive — you hear the wheezing of the respirator that covers half of his face.{/n}
